<template>
    <select v-model="modelValue">
        <option disabled value="">Выберите список</option>
        <option 
        v-for="option in options"
        :value="option.value"
        :key="option.value"
        >{{ option.name }}</option>
    </select>
</template>
<script>

export default {
    name: 'my-select',
    props: {
        modelValue: {
            type: String,
        }
    }
}
</script>
<style scoped>
    
</style>
